mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sa_preference_master ( guid, userguid, configtype, createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime ) VALUES( #GUID#, #USERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONFIGTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sa_preference_master
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, guid=#GUID#, userguid=#USERGUID#, configtype=#CONFIGTYPE#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sa_preference_master WHERE userguid = #USERGUID# AND configtype=#CONFIGTYPE#
